name: Zuzalu Hackathon Kickoff (Come pitch your ideas!)
description:
Zuzalu Network States, AI, DeFi, and Longevity Hackathon

Important Info This Week 

- Start: Thursday, May 11, Kickoff at 11am at the Coworking Space aka Ballroom (FOOD will be provided)

- End: Sunday, May 14, submission deadline at 4pm; hackathon pitch at 4:30pm at the Amphitheater 

- Max 5 ppl per team

- Residents & Visitors can participate



Topics

- Web3 Social, Identity, Instant Messaging
- User-Generated Content, Creator Economy tools, AI bots
- On-chain Games, DeFi
- Playbooks for future network states and longevity jurisdictions


Prizes: Up to $36k in prizes
- Network States: Up to $10k from Mask Network
- AI: Up to $10K from Protocol Labs
- DeFi: Up to $10k from HackVC
- Longevity: Up to $3K from VitaDAO
- Up to $3k from Milos



Context: This is our last hackathon at Zuzalu and it will be a 2 week long experiment

- The initial sprint phase is this Thursday - Sunday
- The pitch on Sunday 4:30pm determines which team gets funded going forward
- The teams will continue to work on their project and pitch their progress on the May 23 Townhall to the community to unlock retroactive funding for their previous week's progress
- At the end of Zuzalu, the teams can apply for Gitcoin Quadratic Funding going forward, so they can keep building post-Zuzalu
